SEARCH
Package com.cytech.fenetres

Class FormulaireAjoutPersonneController

java.lang.Object
com.cytech.fenetres.FormulaireAjoutPersonneController
public class FormulaireAjoutPersonneController extends Object
Controller for the person addition form. Handles the addition of new persons to the genealogical tree, including validation of relationships and age differences between related persons.

    • BoutonValider

      public void BoutonValider(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the validation button click event. Validates the input, creates a new person, and adds them to the tree if all validations pass.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event that triggered this method

    • verifierPersonneValide

      public boolean verifierPersonneValide(Personne nouvellePersonne, ArbreGenealogique arbre)
      Verifies if a person can be added to the tree. Checks for duplicates and date coherence.
      Parameters:
      nouvellePersonne - The person to be verified
      arbre - The genealogical tree
      Returns:
      true if the person can be added, false otherwise

    • ageValide

      public boolean ageValide(String relationChoisie, Personne nouvelle, Personne reference)
      Validates the age difference between two related persons.
      Parameters:
      relationChoisie - The type of relationship being established
      nouvelle - The new person being added
      reference - The reference person
      Returns:
      true if the age difference is valid, false otherwise

      reference - The reference person
